title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies in Practice: Technology-Driven Assessment and Pedagogical Improvement for Computing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners apply logical thinking skills required in computing problem-solving processes with 70% or higher accuracy.
Learners enhance algorithm design skills for solving real-life problems by two levels through formative assessment-based feedback.
Learners complete at least 15 coding practice problems weekly using a real-time quiz system provided in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
